The London Eye is a giant Ferris wheel located on the South Bank of the River Thames in London, England. It is the tallest Ferris wheel in Europe, and the most popular paid tourist attraction in the United Kingdom, visited by over 3.5 million people annually.

The London Eye is a cantilevered observation wheel located on the South Bank of the River Thames in London, England. It is the tallest ferris wheel in Europe, and has become the most popular paid tourist attraction in the United Kingdom.
